description: This file defines a React functional component 'RecipeGrid' that displays a grid of 'RecipeCard' components with handling for empty data and various user interactions.

methods.name: RecipeGrid
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a responsive grid of recipe cards, handling empty states and user interactions like selection, favoriting, editing, and deleting.
